attributes.action: Leave the EU with any deal
attributes.additional_details: I voted remain but accept that the majority, however small, did not. I support a 'Peoples Vote' not because I hope that it will reverse the result but because I believe that the people have a right to be able to also vote for what deal enables the UK to leave the EU. The last vote did not allow this. If this question goes unanswered the deep divisions within our nation created by Brexit will remain for a lifetime.
attributes.background:
Peoples Vote 
One of 6 questions to add to 'Revoke Article 50 ....' 
The others are 
Leave the EU with No deal
Leave the EU under Norway style deal 
Leave the EU under May deal 
Leave the EU under Norway or May deal 
Leave the EU under Norway or No deal 
Leave the EU under May or No deal
